snippet: The practice of agencies’ sharing offices with tax services has slowed as business has grown more competitive. But in some areas of the city, it is still mutually beneficial.
abstract: Elizabeth A Harris The Appraisal column; practice of New York City real estate agencies sharing offices with income tax preparation services has slowed as business has grown more competitive, but in some areas, especially outside Manhattan, arrangement is still mutually beneficial.
lead_paragraph: The practice of agencies’ sharing offices with tax services has slowed as business has grown more competitive. But in some areas of the city, it is still mutually beneficial.

headline.seo: Outside Manhattan, Hybrid Real Estate Services Survive
headline.main: Buying a House? Selling? They Can Do Your Taxes, Too
headline.print_headline: Buying a House? Selling? They Can Do Your Taxes, Too
